TopicTitle: KSP crashes on startup. Access Violation (0xc0000005)

Articles.Content:
Recently i've decided to return to KSP after few months but my game which ran perfectly fine started crashing on startup right after yellow loading bar fills completely.

After a bit of investigation, I decided to try running my more lightwieght modpack but it also started to crash. I've managed to pinpoint the cause to the Bluedog Design Beurau but here is the catch: on my previous pack I don't have BDB installed!

After digging through logs i've found that both crashes are caused by the same error!

I don't know what to do.

No I don't  have Citrix Workspace installed. Tried loading without services - nothing. Windows reinstall is possible but very very undesireble. 

Help appreciated!

Logs heavy pack: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1B0JzFhKcgIRNk7PnP5PEZfr3QknzccPJ?usp=share_link

Logs BDB pack : https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xgZiFiDsdLBu-fcNciKcEJ3M1k98TRRS?usp=share_link
